Package gov.nasa.worldwindx.examples.lineofsight

Class TerrainLineIntersector

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.worldwindx.examples.lineofsight.LineIntersector
      • gov.nasa.worldwindx.examples.lineofsight.TerrainLineIntersector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class TerrainLineIntersector
extends LineIntersector
    Computes the intersections of a collection of lines with the terrain. The lines are specified with a common origin and multiple end positions. For each end position this class computes the intersections of a line between that position and a reference position. See LineIntersector.setReferencePosition(gov.nasa.worldwind.geom.Position) and LineIntersector.setPositions(Iterable).
